TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RulePredicates extends Microsoft.Exchange.WebServices.Data.ComplexProperty
Public NotInheritable Class RulePredicates Inherits ComplexProperty

Docs.summary: Represents the set of conditions and exceptions that are available for a rule.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Categories As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the categories that an incoming message is labeled with in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The categories that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsBodyStrings As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the strings that appear in the body of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The body strings that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsHeaderStrings As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the strings that appear in the headers of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The headers strings that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsRecipientStrings As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the strings that appear in either the ToRecipients or CcRecipients properties of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The recipient strings that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsSenderStrings As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the strings that appears in the From property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The sender strings that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsSubjectOrBodyStrings As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the strings that appear in either the body or the subject of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The subject or body strings that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainsSubjectStrings As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the strings that appear in the subject of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The subject strings that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property FlaggedForAction As Nullable(Of FlaggedForAction)

public: property Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FlaggedForAction> FlaggedForAction { Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FlaggedForAction> get(); void set(Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::FlaggedForAction> value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the flag for action value that appears on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The FlaggedForAction property value.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FromAddresses As EmailAddressCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the e-mail addresses of the senders of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: A collection of e-mail addresses.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FromConnectedAccounts As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the e-mail account names from which incoming messages must have been aggregated in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The e-mail account names that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasAttachments { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must have attachments in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must have attachments in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Importance As Nullable(Of Importance)

public: property Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Importance> Importance { Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Importance> get(); void set(Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Importance> value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the importance that is stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The Importance property value.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsApprovalRequest { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be approval requests in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be approval requests in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAutomaticForward { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be automatic forwards in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be automatic forwards in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAutomaticReply { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be automatic replies in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be automatic replies in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsEncrypted { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be S/MIME encrypted in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be S/MIME encrypted for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMeetingRequest { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be meeting requests in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be meeting requests in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsMeetingResponse { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be meeting responses in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be meeting responses in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsNonDeliveryReport { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be non-delivery reports (NDR) in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be non-delivery reports (NDR) in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPermissionControlled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be permission controlled (RMS protected) in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be permission controlled (RMS protected) in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReadReceipt { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be read receipts in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be read receipts in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSigned { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be S/MIME signed in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be S/MIME signed in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsVoicemail { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether incoming messages must be voice mails in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the incoming messages must be voice mails in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemClasses As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the item classes that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the item classes must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageClassifications As StringList

Docs.summary: Gets the message classifications that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The message classifications that are associated with the message.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NotSentToMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must not be in the ToRecipients property of the incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if owner of the mailbox must not be a To recipient of the incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Sensitivity As Nullable(Of Sensitivity)

public: property Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Sensitivity> Sensitivity { Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Sensitivity> get(); void set(Nullable<Microsoft::Exchange::WebServices::Data::Sensitivity> value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the sensitivity that must be stamped on incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The Sensitivity property value.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentCcMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be in the CcRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the owner of the mailbox must be a Cc recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentOnlyToMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be the only one in the ToRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the owner of the mailbox must be the only To recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SentToAddresses As EmailAddressCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the e-mail addresses that incoming messages must have been sent to in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: A collection of e-mail addresses.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting this property to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentToMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be in the ToRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the owner of the mailbox must be a To recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SentToOrCcMe { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the owner of the mailbox must be in either a ToRecipients or CcRecipients property of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: true if the owner of the mailbox must be either a To recipient or Cc recipient of incoming messages in order for the condition or exception to apply; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WithinDateRange As RulePredicateDateRange

Docs.summary: Gets the date range within which incoming messages must have been received in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The start and end dates.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting the and properties to null.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WithinSizeRange As RulePredicateSizeRange

Docs.summary: Gets the minimum and maximum sizes that incoming messages must have in order for the condition or exception to apply.
Docs.value: The minimum size and maximum size values.

remarks.para: can be disabled by setting the and properties to null.
